column5: I caught this fish in the summer while fishing for carp, i believe its a freshwater drum, but not sure. What do yall think?
Or also known as a Grunt!! Fun to catch , pull like a locomotive!
oh ok, thnx guys, yeah i thought i had a big carp on by the way it was fighting, it sure was fun.
Looks kinda pale, but I agree it's a sheepshead. Here's one from L.Erie this past summer.
yes and they fight and pull like a freight train,this fall at quinte we got one that was 14lbs,lots were caught in the 10lb range they fight really good...
pic turned out bad, damn disposables!!
after swimmin around in lk O for a few more years it could get this big
Sorry I couldn't resist this,being Christmas and all. Little Drum(mer) Boy LOL.
That was bad....lol  & yup its a bbahhhhhhhhh sheep head
